"Special Training: Episode 1":
"This is an exercise VR Training
quest. Aim for the final area
within the time limit.
This will put you through various
events encountered by ARKS, including
the revival of Dark Falz [Elder].
Plan your party's abilities carefully.
――――――――――――――――――――
Time Limit: 15 minutes
Maximum damage cap/999999"
"Well then, let's begin the special training right away."
"This training will be complete when you defeat the final enemy or run out of time."
"Aim for the shortest time, and do your best. Good luck!"
